remarks: Define the cofinality function.  Definition B of Saharon Shelah, _Cardinal Arithmetic_ (1994), p. xxx (Roman numeral 30).  See ~ cfval for its value and a description.  (Contributed by NM, 1-Apr-2004.)
statement:
df-cf $p |- cf = ( x e. On |-> |^| { y | E. z ( y = ( card ` z ) /\ ( z C_ x /\ A. v e. x E. u e. z v C_ u ) ) } ) $.
$d u v x y z $.
